name: Catch The Elf
description:
A platformer game made for the Longy Jam with the prompt: "The elf was on the shelf..."

Aim of the game: Catch the elf as many times as possible before the timer runs out!

Controls:

Move Left/Right = respective arrow keys

Jump = up arrow key

Fastfall/Slide = hold down the down arrow key

Note: I was unable to implement a win screen or replay button so it pauses everything when the time runs out. Close and reopen the game to try again!
